00012 void usage(const char *me) {
00013     cerr<<"usage: "<<me<<" namespace name [del_lf]"<<endl;
00014 }
00015 
00016 int main(int ac, char **av) {
00017     try {
00018             if(ac<3) {
00019                     usage(*av);
00020                     return 1;
00021             }
00022         
00023             string file;
00024             string ln;
00025             while(getline(cin, ln)) {
00026                     file += ln;
00027                     if( ac != 4 ) file += '\n';
00028             }
00029 
00030             if( file.empty() ) {
00031                     cerr<<"string is empty"<<endl;
00032                     return 1;
00033             }
00034 
00035             string ac_conf("auto/");
00036             ac_conf+=av[2];
00037             ac_conf+=".cc";
00038             
00039             ofstream out(ac_conf.c_str(), ios::trunc);
00040             out<<"// file autogenerated, don't edit!"<<endl
00041                 <<"#include \"../cconf.h\""<<endl
00042                 <<"namespace "<<av[1]<<" {"<<endl
00043                 <<"\tclnconf ac_"<<av[2]<<"(\""<<conf_home
00044                 <<"/etc/"<< av[1] <<'/'<<av[2]<<"\",\"";
00045 
00046             string::const_iterator iter, end=file.end();
00047             for( iter=file.begin(); iter!=end; ++iter ) {
00048                     out<< "\\x" << hex << (int) *iter;
00049             }
00050 
00051             out<<"\");"<<endl
00052                 <<"} // namespace "<<av[1]<<endl;
00053             out.close();
00054 
00055             if(! out) {
00056                 cerr<<"can't write: "<<ac_conf<<": "<<strerror(errno)<<endl;
00057                 return 1;
00058             }
00059     } catch( const exception & e ) {
00060             cerr<<"exception: "<<e.what()<<endl;
00061             return 1;
00062     }
00063     return 0;
00064 }
